Name: Cat Knight
About the game: The Knight-Cat goes out to fight evil and embarks on a long journey full of dangers and adventures. On his way, various enemies, obstacles, dangers, tests for agility and speed await him. Will you be able to overcome all difficulties and achieve victory in the end? Cat Knight - Platformer with a variety of game mechanics for each of the worlds, the difficulty of passing them increases with each level passed. Features of the game: - Beautiful Pixel Art - Variety of mechanics - Music
